    1: import numpy as np
    2: import pytest
    3: 
    4: from pandas import (
    5:     NaT,
    6:     PeriodIndex,
    7:     period_range,
    8: )
    9: import pandas._testing as tm
   10: 
   11: 
   12: class TestInsert:
   13:     @pytest.mark.parametrize("na", [np.nan, NaT, None])
   14:     def test_insert(self, na):
   15:         # GH#18295 (test missing)
   16:         expected = PeriodIndex(["2017Q1", NaT, "2017Q2", "2017Q3", "2017Q4"], freq="Q")
   17:         result = period_range("2017Q1", periods=4, freq="Q").insert(1, na)
   18:         tm.assert_index_equal(result, expected)
